JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Electricians for CS Wind in Aalborg
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for skilled Electricians to join our team. You will be responsible for completing important tasks to make sure the project is finished successfully. This position requires a hands-on professional with expertise in electrical systems, safety protocols, and attention to detail.

Location: Aalborg, Denmark
Expected Start Date: February/March 2025

Key Responsibilities

  • Site Preparation: Prepare the worksite for installation activities, ensuring compliance with safety protocols and project requirements.
  • Cable Tray Assembly: Install cable tray infrastructure to facilitate effective cable routing.
  • Cable Routing: Pull and route electrical cables through trays and conduits in alignment with project standards.
  • Cable Tray Installation: Mount and secure cable trays with precision, ensuring alignment and structural integrity.
  • Electrical Equipment Installation: Set up and install electrical devices, control panels, and systems as specified in the project designs.

Qualifications

  • Certification or training in electrical installation or a related discipline.
  • Familiarity with electrical codes, standards, and best practices.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Commitment to safety protocols and procedures.
  • Fluency in English (Danish is a plus).

Application:
We do interviews on an ongoing basis, so please submit your application and relevant attachments as soon as possible. If you have any questions about the position, please do not hesitate to contact Anna Dam on anna@semcomaritime.com  

We look forward to hearing from you.
